description: At this restaurant within the elegant Ciasa Salares hotel, guests dine in a wine cellar with a pleasantly informal and friendly atmosphere. In addition to the excellent cuisine, the fine cheese selection comes highly recommended, as does a visit to the room dedicated entirely to chocolate.
